ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Patch Message
ygData.msgSnippet: Several Test server Bards posted that this fixed the insta-breaks, but that the song is still random duration.  Unlike every other snare in the game.  Even
ygData.messageBody:
Several Test server Bards posted that this fixed the insta-breaks, but that the song is still random
duration. Unlike every other snare in the game. Even though it is also a debuff song that would be nice
to twist.

Kenross Cantoforjado, 57 songs, Innoruuk



Jeffrey Sue wrote:

> At 08:43 AM 2/21/01 -0600, you wrote:
> >Today's patch message....note the bard section and bug fixes. Verant has
> >actually said that our single target snares breaking early was a bug! Also,
> >DDD was upgraded...but I have honestly only ever loaded DDD once, and doubt
> >I will load it after this fix.
>
> no, that's not exactly what they said. i think this only fixes the instabreaks that we've
> seen occasionally. i doubt they made the song fixed duration.
>
>
> Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@... with the subject submissions.
>
> Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/
